response.overview: Twenty-something Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss - excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.
response.tagline: Somewhere on this planet it must exist.
response.title: The Beach

cast.name: Sahajak Boonthanakit
cast.original_name: สหจักร บุญธนกิจ
